name: Lumber Surf
description:
• Move with Arrows or "Q" and "D"
  • Jump wih Space
  • You can also use a Xbox Controller (recommanded) and Jump with "Y" Button.

This is a classic 2D platform game made with Love. Made during my first month of Gameplay Programmer in the 3WA Academy (thans to them).

You can collect  Surf to increase your scoreboard, but to win you must complete 2 levles !

Tip : You can hang your character on the walls (like Spiderman, yeah).

Take care : the GAMEPLAY is quite TOUGH, so good luck !
